content.description: Climb up a brown corner with some stemming, until you can move left and continue up the crack above. Belay to the left of the start of the climb for better rope position.
content.location: About 50 feet left of Funky Junkie, which is at the left end of The Franks.

climbs.name: Northern Migration
climbs.fa: Eric Gotlieb, Dean Kuethe (early 2000s on gear.) Fully bolted in 2018 by Kris Hardy, doni, Vaino Kodas

content.description: Stem & edge up a corner until you can move left around a roof to gain the crack above.
content.location: Northern Migration is about 50 feet to the left of Flying Buttress & Wingin' It, separated by a gully in the rock face to the right of Northern Migration. Start at a local high point in the trail with two closely spaced pine trees close to the rock.

content.description: Reach between some good holds leading up to a ledge where you can move right and join Wingin' it at its 4th bolt.
content.protection: 5 bolts & shares 2 bolt anchor with Wingin' it
content.location: Start about 10 feet to the left of Wingin' It, just left of a yucca.

content.description: This Dove Bar is a somewhat broken up section of rock between The Franks & Showdown Wall.
